RowReorder example Styling

RowReorder requires very little styling information of its own, with styling needed only for the moving and target elements. As such, integrating RowReorder with your application should be as simple as including the Javascript and base stylesheet! This section shows RowReorder being styling using external CSS frameworks and other styling options.

Styling

  • Selector cell styling
  • Horizontal snap
  • Bootstrap styling
  • Semantic UI styling
  • Foundation styling
  • Bootstrap 4 styling
  • jQuery UI styling

Please refer to the DataTables documentation for full information about its API properties and methods.
Additionally, there are a wide range of extensions and plug-ins which extend the capabilities of DataTables.
